pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, March 17, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Guelph, Ontario

Private meetings

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will make a housing announcement. A media availability will follow. He will be joined by the Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion, Ahmed Hussen.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
